section.p: For the Horizon Plugin, you defined a set of services and endpoints in OpenStack Keystone.
To remove the services and endpoints from your OpenStack environment, proceed as follows:

li.p: Provide the administrator credentials that are required to perform any action in OpenStack Keystone. For details, refer to .
For removing the endpoints, you need to know the endpoint IDs:
li.codeblock: openstack endpoint list --service monasca openstack endpoint list --service logs

li.p: Replace <endpoint-id1> and <endpoint-id2> by the endpoints of the two services.
